item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Story of the two thousand stolen Playdate handhelds (123 points | 44 comments)
2. The first close-up picture of a star outside our own galaxy (9 points | 3 comments)
3. IBM Quantum delivers on 2022 100x100 performance challenge (15 points | 4 comments)
4. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (414 points | 53 comments)
5. Traits are a local maximum (27 points | 8 comments)
6. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (107 points | 10 comments)
7. Handling cookies is a minefield (410 points | 203 comments)
8. Bayesian Neural Networks (154 points | 27 comments)
9. Mechanically strong yet metabolizable plastic breaks down in seawater (55 points | 10 comments)
10. Windmill hiring Senior Frontend (Svelte) Engineer in Paris ( | hide)
11. NeuralDEM – Real-Time Simulation of Industrial Particulate Flows (11 points | discuss)
12. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (181 points | 38 comments)
13. Apple will now be treated like a bank (86 points | 37 comments)
14. PHP 8.4 (451 points | 297 comments)
15. Amazon S3 now supports the ability to append data to an object (159 points | 56 comments)
16. The end of ChromeOS is a new dawn for cheap Android laptops (12 points | 2 comments)
17. Security researchers identify new malware targeting Linux (117 points | 50 comments)
18. Interactive Visual Sorting (90 points | 19 comments)
19. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (181 points | 157 comments)
20. Fun with Logitech MX900 Bluetooth receivers (2006) (19 points | 5 comments)
21. The meme-ification of the “Demon Core” (300 points | 226 comments)
22. Growing Music: musical interpretations of L-Systems (2023) [pdf] (12 points | 2 comments)
23. WhisperNER: Unified Open Named Entity and Speech Recognition (76 points | 9 comments)
24. LLäMmlein 1B and 120M – German-only decoder models (7 points | 1 comment)
25. Pidgin 3.0.0 Experimental 1 Announcement (72 points | 32 comments)
26. Machiavelli and the Emergence of the Private Study (46 points | 8 comments)
27. Broadcastarr: Stream web content through your Jellyfin instance (58 points | 32 comments)
28. Oppose the Patent-Troll-Friendly Prevail Act (73 points | 7 comments)
29. The Tao of Topic Maps (2000) (11 points | 2 comments)
30. Software-defined (Internet) radio with Liquidsoap (2023) (28 points | 5 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
